channel.title: Question
channel.description:
is it possible to make it where u kill someone and it gives u a random wepon from a list.
also it it possible that you only get that if u kill them in a certain areA?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“jr pwn, post:1, topic:154023”]is it possible to make it where u kill someone and it gives u a random wepon from a list.

also it it possible that you only get that if u kill them in a certain areA?[/quote]

Make a string, with the item id’s you want, then make a method that makes it grab an id randomly. Then you would go into the applydead method, and call it in there.

Read full topic
